queries.sql: SELECT gene_id, name FROM gene_summary WHERE gene_id = ?1 ORDER BY gene_id ASC LIMIT ?2
SELECT gene_id, name, biotype FROM gene_summary WHERE biotype = ?1 ORDER BY gene_id ASC LIMIT ?2

SELECT g.gene_id, g.seqid, g.start, g.end FROM gene_summary g JOIN gene_summary_rtree r ON r.gene_rowid = g.id WHERE g.seqid = ?1 AND r.start <= ?2 AND r.end >= ?3 ORDER BY g.seqid ASC, g.start ASC, g.gene_id ASC LIMIT ?4
